column5: It is a charming 3rd floor, comfortable and well-appointed apt.all within walking distance to an entertainment and shopping center called Rice Village. A safe desirable neighborhood with convenient access to public transportation, access to rail & metro bus and close to Rice University, the Zoo, the Houston Medical Center, Museum district and NRG stadium are all very close. Great spot to stay, explore and enjoy Houston area. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
